action.action-desc: Mr. Babin introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 49, United States Code, with respect to electronic logging devices, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the ELD Extension Act of 2017.

subsection.text: Section 31137(b)(1)(C) of title 49, United States Code, is amended by striking 2 years and inserting 4 years.
The Secretary of Transportation shall modify regulations issued under section 31137 of title 49, United States Code, as necessary to carry out the amendment made by this section.
